name: 林榮禾
objective:
使學生瞭解全面品質管理的意義、理念、重要性、範圍、實施條件、方法、品管工具，品管工具以外的管理工具、方法，實施全面品管遭遇到的問題，實施全面品質管理的預期成效。
This course introduces the meaning, theories, importance, scope, implementation constraints, methods, quality control tools of TQM.  Besides, the other management tools and approaches are also included.  The course also contains the possible problems and expected effective as implementing.

第 2 週       TQM 基礎 / 品質管理重要貢獻者
